titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Schonberg, et al. v. Sanders, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/26/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators Lieberman, Lincoln, McConnell, McCain, and Sanders in the case of Schonberg, et al. v. Sanders, et al.
